solution_line_template: The car drives {distance_initial} miles in {time_initial} hours, so its average speed is {distance_initial} miles / {time_initial} hours = <<{distance_initial}/{time_initial}={average_speed}>>{average_speed} miles per hour.
In the next {time_next} hours, the car will drive {average_speed} miles/hour * {time_next} hours = <<{average_speed}*{time_next}={distance_next}>>{distance_next} miles.
